name: Kmeans coloring book
tagline: Takes any image through the kmeans algorithm to make a white and black line simplified picture, like a coloring book.
body:
![](http://hiswmm1.s3.amazonaws.com/Kmeans_coloring_book_example.png)
### Kmeans to Make Coloring Book Pages
```
ipython -i kmeans_coloring_book.py
```

Make a coloring book out of any image(s) you have in ./raw_images directory.

Adjust the number of colors (k in kmeans).

### Support or Contact

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
